name: Experiment 17
description:
Perform random experiments on your snake for science... or for other reasons, in a relaxed environment. 

Meanwhile, you may even find the answer to the most important question in the universe: 

Can a man become friends with a snake?

Umut's note: -------------------- This game was originally released as a flash game in 2011. Since then, a good number of people let me know that it was their favorite among my games. So, here is the new remastered 2021 version, enjoy! --------------------
